second_1.speaker: albedo
second_1.text: Now that you understand the situation, {mc.name}, let me show you around Nazarick.

choices.text: That would be great, thank you.
I'd prefer to explore on my own.

second_2.speaker: momonga
second_2.text: {mc.name}, {characters.albedo.title} is one of our most trusted NPCs. She will be an excellent guide.

second_3.speaker: albedo
second_3.text: I understand your desire for independence, {mc.name}, but Nazarick can be dangerous for newcomers.

choices.text: You're right. I'll take the guided tour.

second_4.speaker: albedo
second_4.text: Yes, we are the NPCs of this world. We were programmed to serve the guild, but now...

second_5.speaker: momonga
second_5.text: Now we have consciousness and free will. It's both a blessing and a curse.

choices.text: I'd like to learn more about this.
